name: Orpheus (Weenie Walker Games)
description:
Theme: "Death is only the beginning"

A re-telling of the story of Orpheus and Eurydice, with inspiration from Dante for the 9 levels of hell. Play the full mode with 9 levels or the shorter mode with only 4. All levels created by me, not procedurally generated.

Make your way through the underworld to rescue Eurydice. Once you have gotten her, make your way back up but you cannot move right or up. 

Can you make it out without turning around to look and see if Eurydice is following?

Use WASD/arrow keys to move. Press "P" to pause if you need to restart the game after getting stuck. Use Spacebar or Left Mouse Click to play your "lyre" at your enemies!

Sound effects created using Bosca Ceoil. Voiceover recorded by myself. All other sources listed in Github project:

https://github.com/weenie-walker-games/orpheus
